title: Tommy Bolin - Great Gypsy Soul [DELUXE] [320k MP3]
description:
Greg Hampton (producer of the Tommy Bolin Whips and Roses CDs) and Warren Haynes (GovÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t Mule, Allman Brothers) have co-produced sessions with some of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most famous and revered guitarists and singers for their Tommy Bolin tribute 2-CD set titled Tommy Bolin and Friends - Great Gypsy Soul. Fabrizio Grossi (Whips & Roses I & II, Glenn Hughes) was also on board as Associate Producer/Mix Engineer. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been inspiring to learn that all of these legendary guitarists are all fans of Tommy, and were excited to add parts to original Tommy Bolin multitrack tapes that have never been made public.
